articles.author: Danette Chavez, Pete Volk
articles.title: Marvel SDCC 2022: The biggest news from Marvel Studios
articles.description: Marvel returned to San Diego Comic Con with exciting updates on Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania, and Namor’s debut
articles.content:
Marvel returned to San Diego Comic-Con and Hall H with style and an avalanche of news. 
Marvels SDCC 2022 panel was more than just prep for D23, which kicks off on Sept. 9. We anticipated announceme… [+2494 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Ironheart makes MCU debut at SDCC 2022 in first Black Panther 2 trailer
articles.description: Iron Man protege Riri Williams is Ironheart in a new Disney Plus series and Black Panther: Wakanda Forever. At SDCC 2022, Marvel Studios debuts Dominique Thorne as the superhero Ironheart.
articles.content: Marvel Studios will bring a new armor-clad superhero to movie theaters and to Disney Plus with Ironheart, the heir apparent of the late Tony Stark. Ironheart will appear in both this years Black Pant… [+1584 chars]

articles.title: Avengers: The Kang Dynasty and Avengers: Secret Wars will close out Marvel’s Phase 6
articles.content: At San Diego Comic-Con today Marvel unleashed a flurry of announcements, including the end of Phase 4 and timelines for Phases 5 and 6. Black Panther: Wakanda Forever will now close out Phase 4 of th… [+1405 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Black Panther 2 trailer gives the first glimps of Namor at SDCC 2022
articles.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’s first trailer reveals the identity of the next Black Panther and more. The movie is set to release on Nov. 11.
articles.content: And a first glimpse of Namor

articles.author: Pete Volk
articles.title: Marvel Phase 5: The MCU continues with new schedule of movies and TV
articles.description: Kevin Feige announced the new slate of MCU movies and TV shows at San Diego Comic-Con, with the unveiling of Phase 5, incuding new Ant-Man, Daredevil, and Blade.
articles.content: The upcoming calendar for the Marvel Cinematic Universe has seen a shake-up. The Black Panther sequel Wakanda Forever will now be the final installment of the franchises Phase 4, and the third Ant-Ma… [+4660 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Marvel reveals first Fantastic Four details
articles.description: Marvel shares the first real details about its forthcoming Fantastic Four movie following the departure of Spider-Man: Far From Home director Jon Watts. The movie will bring Marvel’s First Family into the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
articles.content: Although the Marvel Cinematic Universe was built on the shoulders of Tony Stark, Marvel Comics was shaped around the companys First Family: The Fantastic Four. For comics fans, the cinematic omission… [+1380 chars]

articles.title: SDCC 2022: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 will be the ‘end of this team’
articles.description: James Gunn’s third Guardians of the Galaxy movie gets a sneak peek at Marvel Studios’ Hall H panel and San Diego Comic Con, showing off Baby Rocket and Adam Warlock.
articles.content: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 is almost here. After the Guardians tagged along on Thors galaxy-spanning journey of self-discovery in Thor: Love and Thunder, Marvels team of space misfits is back for… [+2467 chars]

articles.title: SDCC 2022: Black Panther 2 will end Marvel’s Phase 4
articles.description: Marvel’s Black Panther: Wakanda Forever will be the final film in the MCU’s Phase 4, the company announced at San Diego Comic-Con.

articles.title: SDCC 2022 news: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania gets MODOK and Bill Murray
articles.description: Marvel Studios gave fans a big update on the third Ant-Man film at their Hall H panel at San Diego Comic-Con 2022. MODOK, Kang the Conquerer, and Bill Murray all made an appearance in the new (not released) trailer.
